summary.Title: IT Tech Lead
summary.Presentation:
We are looking for a new colleague to join a exciting project with our client.
This position is part of the Digital Customer Excellence Value chain, which accounts for ~60% of their client’s

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a new colleague to join a exciting project with our client.

This position is part of the Digital Customer Excellence Value chain, which accounts for ~60% of their client’s annual revenue. They are organized into individual (Scrum) Product Teams who are empowered to innovate and to support the products in the group. Are you an IT professional passionate about leading development and operations in a DevOps environment? Do you have a strong technical foundation combined with leadership skills to drive cross-functional teams towards success? If so, join the team at our client, where innovation meets sustainable IT development.

Location: Mid Jutland, hybrid, 2-3 days pr. week at the office.

QUALIFICATIONS & COMPETENCIES
  • Bachelor’s or master’s degree in IT, Engineering, or a related field
  • At least 8 years of experience in IT development and IT operations
  • Proficiency in Microsoft development stacks and IDEs for C#, VB.NET, F#, C++, Python, and other languages
  • Experiences with Azure Cloud-Based Development Stack, Docker and Kubernetes
  • Solid knowledge of Snowflake and SQL Server databases and their operations
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to balance technical depth with tactical thinking
  • A proven track record of delivering robust, scalable applications within a global, corporate environment
  • Strong problem-solving skills and a collaborative, solution-oriented mindset
  • Excellent communication skills, capable of articulating and understand complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
  • Nice-to-Have: Proven experience in team leadership roles, such as Scrum Master or Project Manager
  • Nice-to-Have: Familiarity with managing Agile ceremonies and facilitating team communication
  • High level English skills in writing and speech
  • Valid EU work permit making you able to start right away
AREA OF RESPONSIBILITY
  • Take on the role of Tech Lead within a dynamic DevOps team, driving development and operations in a SAFe (Scaled Agile Framework) environment
  • Provide technical guidance and leadership, ensuring seamless integration and delivery of solutions
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to enhance processes and ensure alignment with organizational goals
  • Utilize tools like Jira and Confluence to manage Agile workflows and foster transparency and collaboration
  • Advocate for DevOps best practices, including CI/CD, infrastructure automation, and cloud-native development
INTERESTED?

Please note that to apply for this position, you must go to our website. We are unable to process CVs sent directly to our email.

If you have questions about the position, please contact us on:

   denmark@rdtengineers.com

The position will be closed when we have found the right candidate, and we encourage you to apply as soon as possible. Notice only your CV in English is necessary.

Passionate about Engineering - RDT

At RDT, our primary focus is our PEOPLE. We support our employees in professional and individual development. With our flat hierarchy, commitment and values, which inspire them to do their best. We pursue our PEOPLE’s work satisfaction and can guarantee highest quality, which leads to our second mission – our CLIENTS. We, our PEOPLE, provide engineering solutions that enable our customers to have a competitive advantage in efficiency, flexibility and costs.

Thanks to our PEOPLE, we have supplied the best engineering services since 2007 and offer the best and most flexible terms in the market for engineering services.

Be part of our missions and join RDT in Denmark.
